articles.title: Russia's war on Ukraine prompts Denmark to vote on joining EU shared defense policy - CNN
articles.description: Danes vote on Wednesday to decide whether to join the European Union's defense policy, potentially becoming the final hold-out in the bloc to sign up as Russia's invasion of Ukraine forces countries to radically reassess their security.
